scope_of_work.notes: Assumption is this will provide the required security cover needed for the generator compound.
scope_of_work.problem: Following the replacement of 2x CCTV cameras monitoring the Generator Compound in March, the final 2x cameras have now also failed and no longer provide physical security visibility to the North Harbour Central Security Office.
scope_of_work.scope: Provision of all materials and labour to remove the 2x faulty cameras and to install and commission 2x Kyndryl Standard Professional Grade CCTV Cameras.
scope_of_work.justification: The Generator Compound contains the critical standby power systems to support North Harbour DC in the event of power interruptions. Monitoring key infrastructure for physical security is a contractual SLA.
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: Inability to maintain the contractual SLA - physical security monitoring of critical infrastructure.

scope_of_work.justification: To ensure that Kyndryl are adequately prepared for and able to comply with SECR reporting requirements.

input.project_name: UPM-Hz - Kyndryl Warwick Ph1 Office AHU Intake Fan Repair & Refurbishment
input.status_history: here is the status change history of project in numbering order(1):cancelled (2):offer submitted by Jayme Feil (3):sor submitted / draft by Jayme Feil

scope_of_work.problem: On routine plant checks, Phase 1 Office AHU supply fan was found to be very noisy and on investigation it was found that the motor base mounts on one side had collapsed, the motor bearings are noisy and the fan pulleys are significantly worn.
scope_of_work.scope: Specialist to overhaul complete unit, dismantle motor assembly, replace antivibration mountings, replace all bearings, reposition fan motor, replace motor and fan pulleys, install belts and adjust and test for normal operation.
scope_of_work.justification: Phase 1 office provides comport cooling/heating and recommended air changes to the Phase 1 office areas
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: The Phase 1 Office AHU will remain off-line thus not heating and comfort cooling will not be available

output.overview: Project 'UPM-Hz - Kyndryl Warwick Ph1 Office AHU Intake Fan Repair & Refurbishment' is based in United Kingdom at site N/A, managed by Qwerty and prepared by Jayme Feil for client Kyndryl. It is tracked under internal work order UK-EW-13062024-12167 with current status 'Cancelled'.
output.project_scope: The scope notes highlight key considerations: 90 day validity. The problem statement indicates: On routine plant checks, Phase 1 Office AHU supply fan was found to be very noisy and on investigation it was found that the motor base mounts on one side had collapsed, the motor bearings are noisy and the fan pulleys are significantly worn.. The defined scope of work includes: Specialist to overhaul complete unit, dismantle motor assembly, replace antivibration mountings, replace all bearings, reposition fan motor, replace motor and fan pulleys, install belts and adjust and test for normal operation.. The justification provided is: Phase 1 office provides comport cooling/heating and recommended air changes to the Phase 1 office areas. If not approved, the effect would be: The Phase 1 Office AHU will remain off-line thus not heating and comfort cooling will not be available.

input.status_history: here is the status change history of project in numbering order(1):cancelled (2):offer submitted by Eliseo Treutel (3):sor submitted / draft by Eliseo Treutel

scope_of_work.notes: CCTV cameras need replacing as a matter of urgency. Fence require repairs.
scope_of_work.problem: Intruders used power tools to cut a hole in the fencing to site next to the East Powerhouse, entered compound and damaged 3 x CCTV cameras. (57, 58 and 61) leaving the EPH building blind to the main building with no CCTV coverage.
scope_of_work.scope: 1. Remove existing damaged cameras and install replacement Axis externalvandal resistant CCTV cameras.2. Configure and Commission the replacement cameras onto the existing Milestone CCTV software platform.Section of fence needs repairing also.
scope_of_work.justification: East Powerhouse (UPS) LV switch room is cut off from the main building with no means of detecting intruders accessing site with the intent to do harm, damage equipment or remove property. No recording of damage to site until it is too late to address the issue.
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: Extensive damage to site equipment and or theft of equipment of material from site.

scope_of_work.problem: NHB has accumulated hazardous oil waste from DRUPS and Generator diesel engines that requires removal and specialist processing.

scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: Continued storage of the accumulated hazardous oil waste in the DRUPS bulk fuel tank bunds, reducing the bund capacity.Continued risk of a hazardous substance leak.
